skills.title: My Skills
skills.desc: I have gained experience in building projects with various front-end technologies and concepts.

project-1.title: Join
project-1.desc: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, and assign users and categories.

project-2.title: Pro Movies
project-2.desc: Movies App to get information about the latest movies and TV shows. You can search for movies and watch the trailer.
project-2.tech: Angular | TypeScript | HTML | SCSS | REST API

project-3.title: Simple CRM
project-3.desc: Simple CRM to manage customers and income. You can add, edit, and delete customers. It also represents the income and expenses with a bar chart.

project-4.title: El Pollo Loco
project-4.desc: Jump, run, and throw game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.desc: Feel free to send me a message at any time to discuss your needs. I am always available and eager to take on new projects.
